meanings.sent1: I saw fireflies twinkling in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The children chased after the fireflies in the meadow.
meanings.sent3: The fireflies had a glowing party in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: The fireflies lit up the darkness like tiny lanterns.
meanings.sent5: The magical fireflies illuminated the night with their tiny lights.

meanings.definition: A group of fireflies glowing in the dark.
meanings.sent1: The forest was filled with a mesmerizing display of fireflies.
meanings.sent2: We watched the fireflies create a beautiful light show in the evening.
meanings.sent3: The fireflies had a glowing competition in the night sky.
meanings.sent4: The field was alive with the flickering dance of the fireflies.
meanings.sent5: The enchanting fireflies painted the night with their gentle glow.

meanings.definition: The fireflies danced in the night sky.
meanings.sent1: As the sun set, the fireflies began their graceful dance.
meanings.sent2: The night was filled with the twinkling of fireflies above.
meanings.sent3: The fireflies put on a light show in the dark like tiny ballerinas.
meanings.sent4: The fireflies waltzed through the air, painting the night with light.
meanings.sent5: The sky was alive with the magical dance of the fireflies.
